9203.quoteText: We will only collect and process information that we need to deliver the service to you, and to continue to maintain and develop the service.
9203.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

9204.quoteText:
with
academic or non-profit researchers, with aggregation, anonymization.
9204.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

9206.quoteText: In some circumstances your personal data may be transferred to countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA).
9206.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

9207.quoteText:
Personal data that we process for any purpose or purposes shall not be
kept for longer than is necessary for that purpose or those purposes
9207.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

9208.quoteText:
We keep a historical record of
all changes to our Terms on
GitHub.
9208.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time

tosdr.case: This service provides archives of their Terms of Service so that changes can be viewed over time

9209.quoteText:
If you have a Whereby account, you can access, modify or export
your personal information, or delete your account in
Settings.
9209.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data

tosdr.case: This service provides a way for you to export your data

9210.quoteText:
If you delete your
account, your information and content will be unrecoverable after that
time.
9210.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service
